methods.name: public Builder setIncludeTxPower(boolean includeTxPower)
methods.comment: Whether the transmission power level should be included in the periodic packet.

methods.name: public Builder setInterval(int interval)
methods.comment:
* Set advertising interval for periodic advertising, in 1.25ms unit. Valid values are from
         * 80 (100ms) to 65519 (81.89875s). Value from range [interval, interval+20ms] will be
         * picked as the actual value.
         *
         * @throws IllegalArgumentException If the interval is invalid.
